====== HOWTO Add a New Relic RPM User ======

Once you've added the [[howtos:howto-use-new-relic-rpm-with-engine-yard-cloud|New Relic RPM service]] to your account you can now give other users access to the RPM data through the New Relic interface.

This needs to be created through the primary SSO account that turned on the New Relic service.

  - Click on **Services** button under ACCOUNT MANAGEMENT on the left side.
  - Then click the **View performance information** link to view the New Relic app.{{:howtos:add_new_relic_rpm_step_2.jpg?700|Go to New Relic}}\\
  - From the New Relic application click on **Account Settings**.
  - Then click on **Add User** and fill out the form.{{:howtos:add_new_relic_rpm_steps_3-4.jpg?700|Add User}}\\
